db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates instancing with custom materials and a C++ instance table.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += quick quick3d
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick3d/custominstancing INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ cppinstancetable.cpp
HEADERS += \ cppinstancetable.h
RESOURCES += \ qml.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ doc/src/*.*
CONFIG += qmltypes QML_IMPORT_NAME = InstancingExample QML_IMPORT_MAJOR_VERSION = 1
